name: White Stag Women's Short Sleeve Micro Fleece Zip Front Breakfast Robe

reviews.name: White Stag Women's Short Sleeve Micro Fleece Zip Front Breakfast Robe
reviews.reviewText: I love this robe!!! The lightweight fleece is velvety soft, the pink plaid is so pale, & feminine, the 3/4 length sleeves are perfect, but my favorite part is the zipper pull with an adorable heart cut out. Sooooo cute! I'm very happy with this robe, & find it to be more comfortable, & softer than higher priced fleece robes that sell for 4x the price from other stores. A+++++
reviews.title: PRETTY IN PINK

reviews.name: White Stag Women's Short Sleeve Micro Fleece Zip Front Breakfast Robe
reviews.reviewText: This robe is perfect for spring and summer mornings. Just warm and cozy enough, but not bulky. It is well made, but the fabric is light. I will see the durability after laundering. Good value for the price.
reviews.title: Comfortable!

reviews.name: White Stag Women's Short Sleeve Micro Fleece Zip Front Breakfast Robe
reviews.reviewText:
material is super soft. washes well. pink color is beautiful.
fits true to size.
reviews.title: Love this robe!
